articles.title: 'Two souls in one chest': Germany and France renew strained alliance - Euronews
articles.description: Officials from the two countries met on the 60th anniversary of a landmark treaty underpinning today's European Union.
articles.content:
France and Germany met for talks on Sunday in a bid to patch up an alliance strained by the Russian invasion of Ukraine, among other things.
